present.english: The regular customer buys the daily newspaper
The foreign tourists buy the cheap souvenir

imperfect.english: I was buying the hot bread
The regular customer was buying the daily newspaper
The foreign tourists were buying the cheap souvenir

future.english: I will buy the hot bread
The regular customer will buy the daily newspaper
The foreign tourists will buy the cheap souvenir

aorist.english: The regular customer bought the daily newspaper
The foreign tourists bought the cheap souvenir

optative.english: I should buy the hot bread

optative.georgian: რეგულარულმა მომხმარებელმა ყოველდღიური გაზეთი უნდა იყიდოს
optative.english: The regular customer should buy the daily newspaper

optative.georgian: უცხო ტურისტებმა იაფი სუვენირი უნდა იყიდონ
optative.english: The foreign tourists should buy the cheap souvenir

imperative.english: You all (you formal), buy the sweet fruit
